idea:
Viliso Technologies is a start-up company involved in design and development of IoT based environment monitoring product.
At Viliso Technologies we combine technology, know-how and skills of our resources to make the invisible(gas, particulate matter), visible to users.
Our product, HHM (Health Hygiene Monitor) is an IoT(Internet of Things) based electronic device that monitors various types of harmful Gas , Particulate matter in air.
HHM provides real time data to users and allows users to monitor the invisible(chemicals, particulate matter) using mobile and web application from any part of the world
name: VILISO TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
We are Techincept Technologies LLP, a tech startup based out of Mumbai; recently launched our flagship product called FLIXMATES.com

FLIXMATES.com is an “Integrated Platform for Independent professionals and companies”; to source and provide Services and Talents to Entertainment, Events, Showbiz and Creative projects.

Our users include workforce across TV, Cinema, Theatre, Stage, Technical & Non-Technical support services, Vendors, et al. The app will be driven and consumed by B2B and B2C segments of this industry.

Our vision is to create an Integrated global network of professionals and organizations to facilitate continuous earning opportunities across Entertainment, Events, Showbiz and Creative industry.
name: TECHINCEPT TECHNOLOGIES LIMITED LIABILITY PARTNERSHIP

idea:
All Mighty Studio is India's first Non Film Digital label targeted at all india audiences. 


The platform is made to ensure and empower the talented youth of India in getting the music launched. 


This new talent will all be groomed and mentored by the best in the industry, They will be given a chance to be represented by the best artist managers and their talent will be showcased in the best possible manner


The bigger idea is to finally get all the youth connected through an application wherein we can find and support the best talent living anywhere in the world through our mentors.
name: All Mighty Studio

idea:
Uplifting India’s weaving communities through direct market linkage.


Loomfolks enables market exposure for India’s underserved weavers & artisans, and empowers them by creating sustainable livelihood opportunities.
name: LOOMFOLKS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Pedagogy Solutions OPC private ltd is ISO 9001:2015 company focused to provide access to healthcare and education at doorsteps. Pedagogy is committed to improve quality of health care services through consultancy, promoting health care at home, elderly care, cancer care, therapeutic treatment, ayush, disability inclusion and support, education and leveraging use of technology to improve health care and well being of people
name: PEDAGOGY SOLUTIONS (OPC) PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Prophetic Business Solution is a company formed with a purpose to provide one stop business solution with regards to all consultancy,Advisory & Compliance services.It is teaming up with professionals across the country in order to provide variety of services.While teaming up care is taken that one can only pick up 2 areas of expertise and not m ore.Key is to have all services under one roof.The idea is to have a umbrella of services of the highest quality since there is no one after big 4 of the same size.
name: Prophetic Business Solutions Pvt Ltd

idea: Tratoli is a b2b travel company. We sell holiday package of various destinations to registered travel agents. We have customised holiday planning and booking system for travel agent which helps them create a customised holiday in few clicks and less than 5 minutes.
name: Tratoli

idea: COMPUTER HARDWARE NETWORKING SOFTWARE CCTV CAMERA BIOMETRICS ACCESS CONTROL SYSTEM HOME AUTOMATION SALES AND SERVICES SOFTWARE DEVELOPMENT MOBILE APPS DEVELOPMENT
name: Hi Tech Enterprises

idea:
Since 2017, Artikera has been developing itself to cater to the gifting needs. Starting with basic paper bags, we have tried our hands on bags and jewelry. Now that we have settled on paper bags, we intend to offer you the gift packaging of your choice.
– No minimum order quantity.
– Shipping available all over India.
– Customization as per your wish.
Our mission is to provide the largest variety and customization of paper bags that customers can choose from in the market along with giving them the best service and delivery time. Our vision is to be the best, largest and friendliest paper bag manufacturer in the region.
name: Artikera

idea: We want to Startup to Security & Manpower Services
name: SG CASI &CO.
